text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion concerns the availability of an application to register an overseas adoption based on Hague Convention status or specific designation orders. The candidate answer provides comprehensive legal advice regarding estate planning (wills, trusts, beneficiary designations) and medical decision-making (advance directives, healthcare power of attorney) to protect a youngest daughter's inheritance and decision-making rights against challenges from older siblings. This topic is entirely unrelated to the registration of overseas adoptions.", "criterion_id": "232ebde3-5ff2-4c5a-97ca-6a78c0dea13a"}
